name: Sully (K33)
description:
I made this game after discovering the Bitsy engine during the 2020 Coronavirus Lockdown in Ireland. I decided to make a small game to remember a friend that I miss. I really enjoyed the challenge of creating art with such a limited pixel count.

Hopefully my next game will use more conditional logic and variables. I enjoyed making this immensely :)

Thanks to Adam Le Doux for making the engine and Claire Morley for being the discovery that got this game made!
